title: Need for basic spell check on signages
selftext:
Just observed somewhere this signage (To-let for Rent purpose). The painter is not to be blamed. The one who gives the advertisement and then approves the template to be drawn/painted needs to ensure the content is spell-checked.

The painter's responsibility is to just implement and/or create the art work that has been entrusted to him though.

https://preview.redd.it/j4rpdg32osfb1.png?width=526&format=png&auto=webp&s=318f7816ed09f67c7f71f72aec055f3e52921e6f
comments: Perhaps. A templated string and concatenation.
